tool_description: Over 900+ leagues and cups. Deep field statistics, player profiles, and gameplay metrics. Livescores, live news feed, predictions, lineups and much more! The only football API you’ll ever need.
name: Football API by Futmetrics
title: Football API by Futmetrics

api_list.name: Get leagues by countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-api-by-futmetrics.p.rapidapi.com/api/data/league_by_countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-api-by-futmetrics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
